trends: There have been no other sightings in Tewksbury
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my school bus looking outside when I saw some weird object hovering at less than 100mph less than half a mile above the ground. It's hard to discribe because it doesn't fit the discriptions of any UFOs frequently reported although it was flat. I lost sight of it when the bus I was on had driven through a patch of trees. After that, I had looked back and it wasn't there. I didn't tell anyone on the bus because they wouldn't belive it.
